data.text:
We are thrilled to announce the shortlist of our Search for a Storyteller competition, with the Arvon Foundation!

Huge congratulations to the shortlisted authors!

ELEGY by Rosy Easom

FOR NEVER WAS A STORY by Miranda Moore

DO YOU SEE ME NOW? by Áine O Connor

A WAVE IS A SILENT SHOUT by Holly Walton

We'd like to thank everyone who entered; we've read such a range of exciting stories during this process, and it's been a joy to consider them all. We wish you every success with your writing in the future!

On International Fact-Checking Day, a YouGov survey has revealed that 73% of parents trust books to provide the most accurate, age-appropriate information for their children. For fact-checked, scientific research you can trust, check out the EXPLODAPEDIA series by Ben Martynoga & Moose Allain!

See the full survey report here.

EXPLODAPEDIA: The Cell, The Gene & Evolution are available now from all good bookshops. Rewild publishes on 2nd May!

T.K. Hall's stunning reimagining of the Robin Hood legend is The Blind Bowman trilogy. Book one, Shadow of the Wolf, is out now, with Dark Fire and Wildwood Rising coming soon. These epic fantasy novels are full of ancient woodland magic, brutal surprises, beautiful writing and powerful environmental themes. It's Robin Hood like you've never known him before . . .

You can subscribe to T.K. Hall's Substack here! Fantastic Tales and Where to Find Them gives insight into T.K.'s creative process, the routines which help him write, stories of his real-life adventures in the Amazon rainforest - and more.

In T.K.'s own words, it'll be 'a celebration of storytelling – of myth and magic and wonder. I’ve rediscovered my joy of reading and writing, and would love to share that enthusiasm with like-minded people like you. All subscribers will be able to pose questions, and start conversations. So come on in, sit round the virtual fire, and let’s share some tales . . .
